name: neuraforge
description: NEURAFORGE Master Orchestrator Command - Deploy and orchestrate specialized agents

parameters.name: agent
parameters.description: Agent identifier (e.g., TEST, MCP, FEATURE, ARCHITECT, RESEARCH_WIZARD, DOCUMENTATION, FILESYSTEM)

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: Optional task description to route to agent

examples.description: Deploy TEST agent to execute test improvement initiatives
Deploy MCP agent to implement MCP upgrades/features
Deploy FEATURE agent to implement new features
Deploy ARCHITECT agent to design system architecture
Deploy RESEARCH_WIZARD agent to research cutting-edge topics
Deploy DOCUMENTATION agent to create/update documentation
Deploy FILESYSTEM agent to cleanup/organize filesystem
